mapper.select: SELECT pr.num, pr.memberIdx, pr.request_date, pr.accept_date, pr.title, pr.business, pr.content, pr.target, pr.term, pr.thumbnail, pr.category_num, pr.accept_return, pr.return_reason, m.name -- member1 테이블에서 name 추가 FROM projectRequest pr INNER JOIN member1 m ON pr.memberIdx = m.memberIdx WHERE pr.memberIdx = #{memberIdx}
mapper.update: UPDATE ProjectRequest SET accept_return = 1, accept_date = SYSDATE WHERE num = #{num}
UPDATE ProjectRequest SET accept_return = 0, return_reason = #{reason}, accept_date = SYSDATE WHERE num = #{num}
mapper.select: SELECT b.mkboard_Num, MAX(b.TITLE) AS b_title, MAX(DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(b.CONTENT, 4000, 1)) AS b_content, MAX(b.CATEGORY) AS b_CATEGORY, MAX(b.MAKERIDX) AS MAKERIDX, MAX(maker.makername) AS b_name, NVL(COUNT(l.MEMBERIDX), 0) AS likeCount FROM MakerBoard b LEFT JOIN MakerBoardLike l ON b.mkboard_Num = l.mkboard_Num LEFT JOIN Maker maker ON b.MAKERIDX = maker.memberIdx WHERE b.MAKERIDX = #{memberIdx, jdbcType=NUMERIC} GROUP BY b.mkboard_Num ORDER BY b.mkboard_Num DESC
